Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-47022 affecting package openmpi for versions less than 4.1.7-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-47022 affecting package openmpi for versions less than 4.1.7-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openmpi is earlier than 4.1.7-2, affected by CVE-2022-47022
